column5: Hi there, I was wondering if any fellow members could update the board as to the ice conditions on Muskoka around the Tabboo resort area and also Lake of Bays around Dwight. My wife and I along with my son are finding it a little challenging on Simcoe right now as are others. I sure hope conditions get better for Tyler's tournament. Regardless, I will leave the atv at home and walk out with rubber boots for Tyler. Any updates on the lakes would be great. Thanks and tight lines.
i was in the area a couple weeks back and the slush was Nasty !! No sure if its improved but i doubt it
